name: Foxtail's Blackjack v1.1
description:
Hey player!

First thing's first - UPDATE NOTES!!!!!

-NEW final reward image!!

-Formal game ending!

-Deck reshuffles per round, rather than running out of cards

-New "All In" button for hecka convenience

-Aesthetic updates

And if you like this game, why not get the desktop version from our patreon FOR FREE??!?!  And while you're there maybe check out our bonuses like HD images!!!  Some that never even get put into a game ( °Д°)

Oh, did we mention that some patrons have been enjoying an EVEN SEXIER version of this game?  With MORE pictures, music, and voiced lines??  Heck, some of them even have a version with CHEATS in em!  That's right.  We hook our patrons up.

Come check it out!

https://www.patreon.com/foxtailgames

See you there! (^_^)
